title: How to advertise your book on Amazon if your book isn't on KDP - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I asked the question and wanted to give some context. I used a self-publishing company to put my novel on Amazon. So when I go to KDP and want to claim the book, they require an email address and I don’t have it. (Since I wasn’t the one to put it on there). So I can’t use the promote button on KDP.) I was wondering if there was an alternative way to use Amazon advertising. I googled, but everything seems to point to the KDP’s “promote” button. Thanks in advance! :)
You can directly contact the support team and ask them for help. That’s quite easy go to the support tab or contact tab and buzz them.
